translations: 副交感神经；副交感神经系统

sentences.translation: 副交感神经系统使身体放松。

sentences.sentence: The autonomic nervous system has two parts: the sympathetic and the parasympathetic nervous systems.
sentences.translation: 自主神经系统又分为两部分：交感神经系统和副交感神经系统。

sentences.sentence: This will activate your parasympathetic nervous system which will calm you down and slow your heart rate.
sentences.translation: 这样能激活副交感神经，有助于安神和降低心率。
